sk.tomsik68.mclauncher.api.common

Interface IOperatingSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinuxOS, MacintoshOS, SolarisOS, UnknownOS, WindowsOS

    public interface IOperatingSystem
    Interface for Operating Systems

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getArchitecture() 
      java.lang.String getDisplayName() 
      java.lang.String getMinecraftName() 
      java.io.File getWorkingDirectory()

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Returns:
        Human-readable name of the operating system e.g. "Windows XP"

      • getMinecraftName

        java.lang.String getMinecraftName()
        Returns:
        Minecraft's name for this os (win/linux/osx/...)

      • isCurrent

        boolean isCurrent()
        Returns:
        If this pc's operating system matches this interface, return true.

      • getWorkingDirectory

        java.io.File getWorkingDirectory()
        Returns:
        Minecraft working directory on this OS

      • getArchitecture

        java.lang.String getArchitecture()
        Returns:
        Architecture of this system
